channel.title: I need help with getting a server
channel.description:
I think I have everything downloaded like sun java and do i need hamachi? Idt so but just in case. Where can i get a free server to start making? I checked the server links on the doiwnloads forum but those ones were from PREMIUM the webhoster and i have to pay for thos+server is deleted.
Can anyone give me links to a free server site where i can get a server free of charge?
